title: How to rotate a picture by x degree entered by the user?
body:
I want the figure to rotate by some x degree buy i cannot enter variable in rotate(). Please help me . This is the basic code for rotating 3 squares for a certain degree . Please help me i'm stuck here for a long time.

.element {
  display: inline-block;
  background-color: #0074d9;
  height: 100px;
  width: 100px;
  font-size: 1px;
  padding: 1px;
  color: white;
  margin-right: 5px;
  margin-left: 5px;
  animation: roll 3s infinite;
  transform: rotate(30deg);
  opacity: .7;
}

@keyframes roll {
  0% {
    transform: rotate(0);
  }
  100% {
    transform: rotate(360deg);
  }
}


body, html {
  height: 100%;
}


body {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
}
